text:
■ 10月使用流量: 300MB
■ 剩余流量: 0MB
(剩余流量用完时)
☞ 流量不足？ http://kt.com/ltedata>☞ SLT客户 http://kt.com/2cxd
>▶ 您已使用流量安心设限，当剩余流量用尽时，也不会产生额外费用
※ 根据《电信业务法》和科学技术情报通信部规定，KT可以24小时向您发送短信，您也可以选择夜间(21时~次日 09时)拒绝接收。
trans:
■ Data Usage in October: 300MB
■ Remaining Data: 0MB
(When remaining data is exhausted)
☞ Need more cellular data? Visit: http://kt.com/ltedata>☞ For SLT Customers: http://kt.com/2cxd
>▶ You are using the Data Limitation feature. When your remaining data is exhausted, no additional charges will be incurred
※ In accordance with the Telecommunications Business Act and regulations of the Ministry of Science and ICT, KT may send you SMS notifications 24/7. You can choose to decline receiving messages at night (21:00–09:00 of the following day).
